summary: Major hyperscalers (Microsoft, Google, Meta, AWS) have all announced aggressive increases in AI-related capital expenditure for 2024/2025, with Meta forecasting up to $40B. Current GPU rental prices ($3.20/hr) remain at premium levels indicating sustained demand exceeding supply. Industry anticipation is high for new flagship AI models (GPT-5, Gemini 2) expected to launch in the near term.
